verses.text: And in the seventh year Jehoiada strengthened himself, and took the captains of hundreds , Azariah the son of Jeroham , and Ishmael the son of Jehohanan , and Azariah the son of Obed , and Maaseiah the son of Adaiah , and Elishaphat the son of Zichri , into covenant with him.
And they went about in Judah , and gathered the Levites out of all the cities of Judah , and the chief of the fathers of Israel , and they came to Jerusalem.

And all the congregation made a covenant with the king in the house of God. And he said unto them, Behold, the king’s son shall reign , as the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath said of the sons of David.

This \add is\add* the thing that ye shall do ; A third part of you entering on the sabbath , of the priests and of the Levites , \add shall be\add* porters of the doors ;\f + \fr 23.4 \ft doors: Heb. thresholds\f*

And a third part \add shall be\add* at the king’s house ; and a third part at the gate of the foundation : and all the people \add shall be\add* in the courts of the house of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

But let none come into the house of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, save the priests , and they that minister of the Levites ; they shall go in , for they \add are\add* holy : but all the people shall keep the watch of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.

And the Levites shall compass the king round about , every man with his weapons in his hand ; and whosoever \add else\add* cometh into the house , he shall be put to death : but be ye with the king when he cometh in , and when he goeth out.

So the Levites and all Judah did according to all things that Jehoiada the priest had commanded , and took every man his men that were to come in on the sabbath , with them that were to go \add out\add* on the sabbath : for Jehoiada the priest dismissed not the courses.
Moreover Jehoiada the priest delivered to the captains of hundreds spears , and bucklers , and shields , that \add had been\add* king David’s , which \add were\add* in the house of God.

And he set all the people , every man having his weapon in his hand , from the right side of the temple to the left side of the temple , along by the altar and the temple , by the king round about.\f + \fr 23.10 \ft side: Heb. shoulder\f*\f + \fr 23.10 \ft temple: Heb. house\f*

Then they brought out the king’s son , and put upon him the crown , and \add gave him\add* the testimony , and made him king. And Jehoiada and his sons anointed him, and said , God save the king.\f + \fr 23.11 \ft God…: Heb. Let the king live\f* \p
¶ Now when Athaliah heard the noise of the people running and praising the king , she came to the people into the house of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*:

And she looked , and, behold, the king stood at his pillar at the entering in , and the princes and the trumpets by the king : and all the people of the land rejoiced , and sounded with trumpets , also the singers with instruments of musick , and such as taught to sing praise. Then Athaliah rent her clothes , and said , Treason , Treason.\f + \fr 23.13 \ft Treason: Heb. Conspiracy\f*

Then Jehoiada the priest brought out the captains of hundreds that were set over the host , and said unto them, Have her forth of the ranges : and whoso followeth her, let him be slain with the sword. For the priest said , Slay her not in the house of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.
So they laid hands on her; and when she was come to the entering of the horse gate by the king’s house , they slew her there. \p
¶ And Jehoiada made a covenant between him, and between all the people , and between the king , that they should be the \nd \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* people.
Then all the people went to the house of Baal , and brake it down , and brake his altars and his images in pieces , and slew Mattan the priest of Baal before the altars.

Also Jehoiada appointed the offices of the house of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* by the hand of the priests the Levites , whom David had distributed in the house of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, to offer the burnt offerings of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, as \add it is\add* written in the law of Moses , with rejoicing and with singing , \add as it was ordained\add* by David.  +  r 23.18  t as it was…: Heb. by the hands of David *
And he set the porters at the gates of the house of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, that none \add which was\add* unclean in any thing should enter in.

And he took the captains of hundreds , and the nobles , and the governors of the people , and all the people of the land , and brought down the king from the house of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: and they came through the high gate into the king’s house , and set the king upon the throne of the kingdom.
And all the people of the land rejoiced : and the city was quiet , after that they had slain Athaliah with the sword.
